name: Nicholas Munson

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: As a Frontend Developer on a collaborative, close-knit team, I focus on Greenfield feature development using React with TypeScript, CSS Modules, React Hook Form, and Radix UI, supporting the mission to decouple the frontend from a Ruby on Rails backend. In addition to developing new features, I maintain the legacy frontend codebase, which involves working with Ruby on Rails ERB, Alpine.js, and Tailwind CSS. I contribute to technology decisions for Greenfield projects and collaborate closely with skilled team members to solve problems and drive projects forward.

experiences.position: Lead Full Stack Engineer at Clean Earth Rovers
experiences.bullets: At Clean Earth Rovers, I served as the Lead Full-Stack Developer, leveraging my extensive experience to drive the development of critical systems and components. On the server side, I designed and implemented a robust API using Node and Express, along with a secure login flow and a data pipeline powered by Google Cloud Platform. On the client side, I developed a React front-end from the ground up, ensuring pixel-perfect alignment with Figma designs and delivering a user-centered, data-driven experience. As the sole contributor, I created and implemented a data dashboard to provide real-time visualization of dynamic water metrics data. Additionally, I developed a comprehensive library of over 50 reusable components to streamline future development efforts and ensure a consistent visual style across the application.

experiences.position: Frontend Engineer / Application manager at Intelivideo
experiences.bullets: As a Software Engineer, I am responsible for finding software solutions to address issues and inefficiencies in our internal application build process. This includes building clean User Interfaces for our Client Success Management team to seamlessly add client metadata to our database and integrating automation tools to improve process efficiency.  As an Application Manager, I oversee the configuration, testing, and deployment of all new client applications, while maintaining and updating over 180 Intelivideo client TV and mobile applications.
